nodes.text: Hive of the Infidel is a Star Wars Roleplaying Game adventure published in Star Wars Gamer 8. It was written by David Noonan and Peter M. Schweighofer, and was illustrated by Derek Thompson.
The players take on the role of Yuuzhan Vong infiltrators. They are hunting a Jedi aboard the Chilastra.
Once aboard, they must search for the Force Adept Ka-Tu-Un.
